message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.

I understand that you're looking to meet me halfway, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking more along the lines of $16000. This is my best and final offer for now.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $15500. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand that you're trying to meet me halfway again, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $15500. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking more along the lines of $16500. This is my last offer before considering other options.

I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but I'm getting close to my limit. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time, but I can only go up to $15250. I'm hoping we can find a compromise that works for both of us.
